title: Didn't Get Star Guardian Icon...
body:
Well, not a issue for the Community not for me but I did the quiz and no Icon Rito pls?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{champion:121}}

replies.body: As long as you were logged in while taking the quiz, you'll be fine!  It can take up to 72 hours for it to arrive.  Hang in there, the goods will come!
I did it like a week ago and I was logged in as well but I haven't recieved the icon
i still haven't received mine. i played the quiz several times and made sure i was logged in

I did the quiz about 5 days ago and still no icon, but my friends took it the next day after they did it.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  Why is that?

Mine didn't show up untill the day after I took it.
I logged in and the gift thing started playing and was wondering what it was.

One year and counting; still haven't received it. {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
Asked support and they basically said "haha fuck you too late".
been 5 months and haven't gotten the icon......
Yeah, me too it's been so long
Still no icon.
I haven't got my icon yet {{item:3070}} I have this account and my other account, did the quiz on both, and haven't received it yet {{item:3070}}
Its been a month, please give us our icon!! {{item:3070}}

Same here i did it when it came out and still no icon i did the test like 15 times and im worried.I'm not getting the icon am i it's been like a month :(  

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
same T-T
Still no icon for me either, tried the quiz multiple times on multiple browsers over multiple days =\
I've been waiting for weeks but I still don't have it.. I took the quiz twice
same, i really want that icon ... :(
DIdnt get the icon-_- 2{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
i did the quizz 7 days ago and STILL no icon....rito plz i want that icon! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
ive got the same probs
Same here, Still no icon :({{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
I haven't gotten the icon and I did it about 5-6 days ago.
Same here, didnt get the icon for 6 days now.. I really want that icon Riot!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
A week later... still no icon
Same here, took the quiz several times....No icon yet.
I don't have the icon,I took the quiz like 5 days ago.{{summoner:30}}
yep no icon here either aven after 4.5 dayus
5 days have passed, still no icon

> [{quoted}](name=Red Dragon 95,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LR3uEEMl,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-10-10T17:17:09.393+0000)
>
> 5 days have passed, still no icon{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} 

Me too
same here

me too
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Yes please fix this issue Riot I would like the icon please. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Took my test on 10/7, still haven't got my icon as of 10/13. Took the test again and it said I already took the test. ;/ pls rito
I have done the quiz 2 times and it says i have received it? but i did not receive anything
I got it fortunately, You need to make sure it says "You Have Already Received This Icon" and it should show up in 3 days at most{{champion:121}} ACTAULLY RITO CHANGED IT TO A WEEK LOL RITO PLZ
The end of the quiz stated that it can take a few days for the icon to show up.
a few days and a week are very differant

I made that post back when it was believed to be up to 3 days. However, it has already come to my attention that it can take up to a week for the icon to be added, as per a [Red post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/fRuOekr3-the-star-guardian-quiz?comment=0001) made after I made that one.
thanks  for the link :3
did the quiz about 4-5 days ago still no icon

Kay Kay Its been like 30 hours Ill make sure to update If it doesnt show up!!! Thanks Porocles
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
